review: When I bought this thing I was not sure exactly how it worked or what it does. I figured for $35.00 it was worth the gamble. What it does is allows one to access online videos with your smart phone, computer, netbook, or laptop from the likes of You tube, Netflix, Hulu and others. You can than send the videos via WiFi to the Chromecast player which plays them on your TV. It works well! It does not replace one's satelite or cable tv as it is advertised, but it does add some additional viewing options.
